short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's create a better internet together.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DigiCrow - a one-stop solution to protect you from website impersonation threats.
 
DigiCrow is a browser extension that uses AI and machine learning to scan and analyze every site you visit and warn you if you are visiting a risky website.

As a user, please verify authenticity of any website or link using DigiCrow chrome extension. Please continue your online journey only if you are getting green signal from DigiCrow. If, you are getting red flag, please don't interact with the website. 

There can be some websites which will be marked as yellow (warning) sites. Please verify authenticity of such websites from other sources. We don't recommend you to interact with red or yellow web-pages. 

DigiCrow's mission is to make internet a safer place to hangout for everyone whether you are tech-savvy or not.
